DOC.brief_title: Cerclage Prevention Preterm Birth Women With Placenta Previa
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study perform large multi-center randomize trial compare role cervical cerclage versus expectant management woman placenta previa presenting shorten cervical length ( ≥ 10mm ≤ 30mm ) 18w0d 26w0d gestation . In addition , role fetal fibronectin ( fFN ) prediction preterm birth hemorrhage elucidate . The hypothesis placement cervical cerclage 18w0d 26w0d patient short cervix complete placenta previa decrease preterm birth compare expectantly manage patient .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy , ≥ 18yrs old GA 18w0d 26w0d inclusive @ time enrollment Documentation complete placenta previa ( ≥ 10mm internal o ) Agrees participate trial signs/date inform consent form . Contraindication expectant management ( i.e . active labor , Nonreassuring fetal heart rate ( NRFHR ) , Intrauterine fetal demise ( IUFD ) , uncontrolled hemorrhage ) Fetal condition likely cause serious neonatal morbidity independent GA ( e.g . hydrops , fetal viral infection , fetal malformation likely need surgery like hydrocephalus , neural tube defect , cardiac defect , abdominal wall defect ) Known uterine anomaly time enrollment History two prior cesarean delivery Suspected placenta accrete , increta percreta US enrollment Cervical cerclage present time enrollment
